name: Blue & Green
description:
Description:

Blue & Green is a hardcore clicker game.

Made for bit jam.

Rules:

You need to close the game window.

Click the left mouse button when the window is blue to decrease the game window.

Click the right mouse button when the window is green to decrease the game window.

You have half a second to make a right click.

If you don't follow these rules the window will increase.
